mapper.select: select a.*,b.compmsg,b.apprmsg,b.reqmsg,c.fname from wbs a,works b,workfile c where a.workcode = #{workcode} and a.workcode = b.workcode(+) AND a.workcode = c.workcode(+)
mapper.update: MERGE INTO works a USING dual ON (a.workcode = #{workcode}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET a.reqmsg = #{reqmsg}, a.apprdate = sysdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (workcode,reqmsg,apprdate) values (#{workcode},#{reqmsg},sysdate)

merge into workfile a using dual on (a.workcode = #{workcode}) when matched then update set a.fname = #{fname}, a.regdate = sysdate, a.uptdate = sysdate when not matched then insert values(#{workcode}, #{fname},sysdate,sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * from (SELECT rownum AS NO,a.*,b.APPRDATE FROM wbs a, works b WHERE a.workcode = b.WORKCODE AND a.pm = #{name} AND a.STATUS = '승인요청' ORDER BY b.APPRDATE desc) WHERE NO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
